items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too small
items.body: A little snug thepugh shoulders but does not fit large chested women. Read more
items.author: Brooke Clemmens

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fit well at all
items.body: I ordered this in two different sizes and both of them the top popped open and I’m a c cup. I had to return both sizes. This might be more suitable for a very small person. I’m a size 10 and it didn’t work for me. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: I loved this. I am returning it, only because it is very Christmasy and we don't go anywhere that requires us to dress up. But I loved it. Read more
items.author: jennifer l. mcardle

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poorly Made. Low Quality.
items.body: Looked flimsy. Returned item . Read more
items.author: BrnSgr

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrap around dress
items.body: This dress is okay , it has zero stretch so be aware. It’s a wrap around dress. Material is soft and seems are pretty good. The color is good not see through at all. Good length for me. I’m 5’4 165 38C medium won’t close at my bust. Needed a camisole. Read more
items.author: cakeXocean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!!!
items.body: I always get compliments on this dress. It’s the perfect Christmas dress. The material is great. I have no complaints. Read more
items.author: AMS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too small...had to return
items.body: Too small. Wouldn't close over my bust, barely covered my butt and nothing else. I love a real wrap dress and they need to extend their sizes bc mid-size girlie could rock this. Sad to return because I wanted to love it Read more
items.author: FLbleubelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, flattering holiday wrap dress! Like flannel pajamas in dress form.
items.body: I love this red plaid wrap dress! I will 100% be wearing this to holiday parties. It is so cute and quite flattering. It is a true wrap dress, with long ties that you loop through the side seam and tie on one side to secure I found it true to size. I'm 5'8", 150lb, size US 8, and the medium fits well. I am also 34DDD, and I am pleased to report that there are 3 options on how to display or cover your cleavage in this dress: wrapped but not snapped (wider photo), with the snap closed (tighter photo), or with a camisole or tank top under (not pictured). This means I can wear it more covered up to a work party, or show a little va-va-voom with a sexier look for non-work parties! It's a poly/cotton blend (60% polyester, 33% cotton, 5% rayon, 2% spandex), and is reminiscent of flannel pajama material. I did have to trim off a few loose threads around the edges. I don't expect it to last for a decade or anything, but for $36 it's a great holiday piece that I'll keep around for 2 or 3 seasons. Read more
items.author: Michelle Myers

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
